quiz_data.question: What is a critical section in an operating system?
options: A code segment where shared resources are accessed
quiz_data.answer: A code segment where shared resources are accessed

quiz_data.question: Which scheduling algorithm is also known as First Come First Serve?
What is the purpose of virtual memory?
options: To simulate more RAM than physically available
quiz_data.answer: To simulate more RAM than physically available

quiz_data.question: What is a process in an operating system?
Which of the following is a non-preemptive scheduling algorithm?
What is the main function of the command interpreter?
options: To provide the interface between the user and the computer hardware
To handle the files in the system
To get and execute the next user-specified command
quiz_data.answer: To get and execute the next user-specified command

quiz_data.question: What is thrashing in an operating system?
Which of the following is a synchronization tool?
What is the main purpose of an interrupt in an operating system?
options: To provide a way to break the normal sequence of execution
To provide a way to increase the speed of the CPU
To provide a way to decrease the speed of the CPU
To provide a way to handle memory management
quiz_data.answer: To provide a way to break the normal sequence of execution

quiz_data.question: What is the role of the page table in a virtual memory system?
options: To map virtual addresses to physical addresses
To map physical addresses to virtual addresses
To store the contents of the virtual memory
To store the contents of the physical memory
quiz_data.answer: To map virtual addresses to physical addresses
